prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Spanish Refugee Aid Graphics; GRAPHICS 028; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: This collection was separated from the Spanish Refugee Aid Records (TAM 326). The accession numbers associated with these materials are 2004.010 and NPA.2008.004.

Spanish Refugee Aid (SRA) office records and inactive case files were placed, on deposit, at Brandeis University in 1984 when SRA was absorbed into the International Rescue Committee; a subsequent transfer of inactive case files was made to Brandeis in 1992. SRA donated all records held by Brandeis and some additional materials to the Tamiment Library, New York University, in 2004. When SRA was dissolved in 2006, a final donation of records from the SRA/IRC offices in New York and Toulouse was sent to NYU.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by Spanish Refugee Aid were transferred to New York University in 2004 by Spanish Refugee Aid. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Archives. Please contact tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu, (212) 998-2630.

Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by Spanish Refugee Aid, the creator of this collection, were transferred to New York University in 2004. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from the Tamiment Library.
